body:
Hi Antonello, This happens when i just insert the component. It is not related to any input file. Testing the code i get: Runtime error (SystemException): 'unicodeescape' codec can't decode bytes in position 383: malformed \N character escape
Traceback (most recent call last):
SystemError: 'unicodeescape' codec can't decode bytes in position 383: malformed \N character escape See image both components, one connected and one not connected. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4*70048ZsE5439h8EBwlCNxw3vSp9bpRzVnwn67Lr-FbL3LcDbf9EUoKWqTcZzLGpHF9kEZi6EhZuysTZcXhZ83r-5UTRV4X/Capture.JPG) Thanks, -A.
